text: BING NEWS: Tests on ducks could provide early warning on bird flu MINNEAPOLIS (AP) — As the poultry industry braces for a potential return of bird flu this fall, wildlife managers expect the first results next week from tests that could provide an early warning on whether ducks are carrying the disease as they fly ... 10/1/2015 - 7:49 am | View Link Iowa auditor: State budget strong, but warning signs ahead DES MOINES | State revenue growth is strong, the emergency reserves are fully funded, and Iowa lawmakers — for the most part — are implementing wise budgeting practices.
